mapper.insert: insert into material ( material_id, material_name, material_num, material_description, create_time, create_user, update_time, update_user, delete_flag ) values ( #{materialId}, #{materialName}, #{materialNum}, #{materialDescription}, now(), #{createUser}, now(), #{createUser}, '0' )
mapper.update:
update material
material_name=#{materialName},
material_num=#{materialNum},
material_description=#{materialDescription},
update_time = now()
where material_id = #{materialId}
mapper.select: select material_id, material_name, material_num, create_time, create_user,update_time from material where delete_flag = '0' order by create_time desc
